abstract: Former NFL wide receiver Irving Fryar is given five-year prison sentence for his role in mortgage fraud scam.
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. star Irving Fryar was sentenced to five years in a New Jersey prison for his role in a mortgage fraud.

headline.print_headline: Fryar Sentenced to Five Years for Fraud

snippet: The former N.F.L. star Irving Fryar was sentenced to five years in a New Jersey prison for his role in a mortgage fraud.
